original_text: So Joab sent someone to Tekoa and had a wise woman brought from there. He said to her, “Pretend you are in mourning. Dress in mourning clothes, and don’t use any cosmetic lotions. Act like a woman who has spent many days grieving for the dead.
korean_text: 드고아에 사람을 보내 거기서 지혜로운 여인 하나를 데려다가 그에게 이르되 청하건대 너는 상주가 된 것처럼 상복을 입고 기름을 바르지 말고 죽은 사람을 위하여 오래 슬퍼하는 여인 같이 하고

sentences.original_text: So Joab sent someone to Tekoa
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 요압은 어떤 사람을 고골에 보냈고

sentences.original_text: and had a wise woman brought from there
and don't use any cosmetic lotions
who has spent many days grieving for the dead
sentences.korean_translation: 죽은 사람을 위해 많은 날을 슬퍼했던
